typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Predicted_SE_Other as string,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as string,
		Actual_SE_Cartage as string,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as string,
		Actual_SE_Other as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as integer,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalHarvestReconciliation
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other = ConvertDatesAndNumbersAndID@Actual_SE_Other,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalHarvestReconciliation derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Harvest_Unit,Operation_Type_Code,Product_Code,Species_Code,Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,Predicted_Harvested_GMT,Predicted_Revenue,Predicted_Stumpage,Actual_Harvest_Commencement,Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,Actual_Harvested_GMT,Actual_Revenue,Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,Predicted_SE_Cartage,Predicted_SE_Harvesting,Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Predicted_SE_Other,Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,Actual_SE_Cartage,Actual_SE_Harvesting,Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Actual_SE_Other)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Harvest_ID = Harvest_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Harvest_Unit = Harvest_Unit,
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code,
		Relation_Product_Code = Product_Code,
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code,
		Relation_Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Relation_Predicted_Harvested_GMT = Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Relation_Predicted_Revenue = Predicted_Revenue,
		Relation_Predicted_Stumpage = Predicted_Stumpage,
		Relation_Actual_Harvest_Commencement = Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Relation_Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Relation_Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Relation_Actual_Harvested_GMT = Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Relation_Actual_Revenue = Actual_Revenue,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Cartage = Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Harvesting = Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Relation_Predicted_SE_Other = Predicted_SE_Other,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Cartage = Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Harvesting = Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Relation_Actual_SE_Other = Actual_SE_Other,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndNumbersAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Harvest_Unit,Operation_Type_Code,Product_Code,Species_Code,Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,Predicted_Harvested_GMT,Predicted_Revenue,Predicted_Stumpage,Actual_Harvest_Commencement,Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,Actual_Harvested_GMT,Actual_Revenue,Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,Predicted_SE_Cartage,Predicted_SE_Harvesting,Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Predicted_SE_Other,Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,Actual_SE_Cartage,Actual_SE_Harvesting,Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,Actual_SE_Other)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Harvest_ID == Relation_Harvest_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingRecord@NewRecord select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Harvest_ID = toInteger(Harvest_ID),
		Harvest_Unit = toInteger(Harvest_Unit),
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Cartage, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Harvesting, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence, 19, 4, "###,###.##"),
		Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_SE_Other, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDatesAndNumbersAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingRecord@(NewRecord, ChangedRecord, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingRecord@ChangedRecord derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID = Relation_Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Harvest_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as integer,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Harvest_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Harvest_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
